objects.name: ExampleDescription
objects.string:
Use left mouse button to open a storage
Use left mouse button to collect dropped items
Some storage is may be locked, use right mouse button to break the storage
You may need to click more than once to break a storage

events.comment:
for more examples visit gametemplates.itch.io
to learn how to use the example, please refer to the doumentation included with the example
if the storage is clicked with left mouse button, and the storage is NOT locked, change animaton to empty
If there is nothing in the storage, update the message to let the player know

if something is stored in the storage and it is NOT a random item, create a dropitem and set animation to be the one stored in the storage
we also get the quantity and store it inside the dropitem object, so when we collect it, we know how many we have collected
update message to display you found something
we set the storage to no longer store any item

if a random item stored in the storage, create a dropitem and set a random animation
we also get the quantity from the storage
update message to display you found something
we set the storage to no longer store any item
if storage is locked, update message to say it locked, maybe you can brake it

parameters: "It is locked! Maybe you can break it"

events.comment: If the storage is clicked with the right mouse button, reduce it durability by 50
if durability of the storage is less or equal to 0, change storage animation to broken
if the storage is empty, update message you found nothing

if something is stored in the storage and it is NOT a random item, create a dropitem and set animation to be the one stored in the storage
we also get the quantity and store it inside the dropitem object, so when we collect it, we know how many we have collected
update message to display you found something
we set the storage to no longer store any item and it is not locked

if a random item stored in the storage, create a dropitem and set a random animation
we also get the quantity from the storage
update message to display you found something
we set the storage to no longer store any item
If left mouse button is clicked on a dropitem, collect the item

this example does not include an inventory or any way to store collected items
for now we only display the message of what we have collected and how many then delete the item, you may want to add your logic here to add the item to an inventory
